VEvil.​GameLogic.​Health.​AHealthModule
MonoBehaviour
public abstract
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Health.​AHealthModule
VEvil.​Dummies.​GameLogic.​DummyDamageable
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Buildings.​NexusHealth
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Units.​UnitHealthModule

AHealthModule bring a pretty "primitive" way to manage health on a GameObject.

You can place this component right next to a TeamIndicator one, this component will keep its ETeamType.

Variables
healthPreset
[Header("Health Module - Settings")]
[SerializeField, Tooltip("The HealthPreset of this Health Module.\nThis field is optional if you're planning to modify this field in runtime at the initialization of this entity.")]
private HealthPreset healthPreset
onHealthChangedEditor
[Header("Health Module - Events")]
[SerializeField, Tooltip("Invoked when the health of this Health Module has been changed.\nArg 01: The previous amount of health.\nArg 02: The new amount of health.")]
private UnityEvent<int, int> onHealthChangedEditor
onHealthEmptyEditor
[SerializeField, Tooltip("Invoked when this Health Module has no more health.")]
private UnityEvent onHealthEmptyEditor
onHealthChanged
private Action<int, int> onHealthChanged

Invoked when the Health of this AHealthModule has been changed.

Parameters
01

The previous amount of health.

02

The new amount of health.

onHealthEmpty
private Action onHealthEmpty

Invoked when this AHealthModule has no more health.

get;
private 
set
}

The current amount of health this AHealthModule have.

HealthPreset
public HealthPreset HealthPreset {
get;
set
}

The default HealthPreset given.

If this value is modified in runtime, the health values will be reset to the one given in the new value.
